title: JIT cuda error with non default GPU ID
body_html:
I found an issue when using a GPU with ID != 0. If I run all of the .cuda calls with the GPU argument of 1
-- .cuda(1), I get an error:

RuntimeError: arguments are located on different GPUs at
../pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathPairwise.cu:259

It happens only with the JIT class decorations on. Also, it does not happen when the GPU id == 0.

Let me know if you can reproduce this, if not, I will create a simplified test case for you.
